rooms.title: Worn Stone Landing
rooms.description: You stand on a time-polished stone platform. Four archways lead to shadowed corridors: north (the library), east (the workshop), south (the garden), west (the market).

items.name: Weathered Compass
items.description: Its needle spins lazily, pointing toward adventures yet untaken.

items.name: Folded Map
items.description: Ink sketches reveal hints about the four neighboring districts.

npcs.name: Stone Guide
npcs.auto_greet: Welcome to the crossroads. Venture boldly, traveler!
